EmailTemplate.description: Template to send when a case is created outside business hours
EmailTemplate.name: Case Outside Business Hours
EmailTemplate.subject: Case # {!Case.CaseNumber}: {!Case.Subject}
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Dear {!Contact.Name},
Thanks for getting in touch.
We wanted you to know that we’ve got your email. This is an auto-response so you don’t need to reply.
Your reference number is {!Case.CaseNumber}.
Our working hours are 8am until 6pm Monday to Friday except for Bank Holidays.
We will contact with you between the above times.
If you need to contact us before then you can call us on 0800 100 600 quoting your reference number or alternatively you can visit our website for more information at www.tnt.co.uk
Yours Sincerely
TNT Domestic Customer Service
